block.p: The Hearst Book Group in New York, a unit of the Hearst Corporation, named William M. Wright, president and chief executive. He succeeds Howard Kaminsky who left the company in 1994. Mr. Wright, 46, will be responsible for overseeing the operations of both William Morrow & Company and Avon Books, members of the Hearst Book Group. Mr. Wright said he hoped to expand the author list, as well as further develop the nonfiction, romance and children's publishing franchises. He previously was the executive vice president and chief operating officer of Random House Inc. in New York.
